summary: Team management application with admin and user roles, invitation system, and team overview dashboard
architectural_notes: Application has admin and user role system
User data persistence required across updates

existing_features.title: Add the ability to create invite links specifically for the administrator role, allowing admins to share administrative privileges with new users
Display user names instead of identity codes in the Team Overview (Panoramica team) to meet regulatory compliance requirements for managing team members
Show the creation date and time for each generated invite link in the invite management interface

new_feature_requests.summary: Create invite links for admin role sharing
Display user names instead of codes in Team Overview for regulatory compliance
Show creation date and time when generating invite links

projectName: Add admin invites, user names in team overview, and invite timestamps
